alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 3:05PM EST until December 19 at 10:12PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New York... West Branch Delaware At Walton affecting Delaware County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...West Branch Delaware at Walton. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Fairgrounds begin to flood at 10 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 5.8 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM EST.
